AboutMe:
I'm a student of mathematics and computer science at Utrecht University, currently fascinated by parsing and set theory. I started learning C++ in 2008, and have since then also picked up Python and C#, and intend to learn some Haskell in the near future.

Apart from that, I play go (less often than I'd like), try to learn Lojban (with less success than I'd like), and am a member of Biton.

I am also known as jesyspa elsewhere on the net.
